name: Hybrid Invoker

classTraits.classSkills: : Arcana (Int), Diplomacy (Cha), Endurance (Con), History (Int), Insight (Wis), Intimidate (Cha), Religion (Int).
classTraits.hybridTalentOptions: : Channel Divinity (Hybrid Invoker) or Invoker Armor proficiency.

classText: You wield the might of the gods, mixed with powers more earthly. But why would you forgo pure devotion to the secrets of the invoker? Did you uncover a mystery that frightened you from wielding such unfettered power? Or has your understanding of divinity only recently awakened? As a hybrid invoker, you wield the godsâ€™ own might to smite your foes. However, you forgo the versatility of Channel Divinity and Ritual Casting to gain the benefits of another class.

classFeatures.covenantManifestation: You gain the Covenant Manifestation of a Divine Covenant of your choice.
classFeatures.hybridTalentOptions: If you take the Hybrid Talent feat, you can select one of the following options.
classFeatures.channelDivinity(hybridInvoker): This class feature functions as the invoker class feature, except that you start with a single Channel Divinity power. That power is the Channel Divinity power associated with the same Divine Covenant as your Covenant Manifestation.
classFeatures.invokerArmorProficiency: You gain proficiency with leather armor, hide armor, and chainmail.
